scripts.history:pdf: echo 'Date, Filename, Author, Github URL, Direct Download URL' > ./history/covid-static-pdf-history.csv && git ls-files '*.pdf' '*.PDF' -z  | xargs -0 -L1 -I'{}' git log --date=short --format='%ad, {}, %an, https://github.com/cagov/covid-static/blob/%H/{}, https://github.com/cagov/covid-static/raw/%H/{}' -- '{}' >> ./history/covid-static-pdf-history.csv
